title: Flight Safety Checker
description: Santa flies from start to end hours. Given unsafe intervals, determine if any part of the flight overlaps an unsafe time. If any overlap exists, output "Unsafe"; otherwise output "Safe".

method_signatures.java: public static String checkSafety(int start, int end, int[][] unsafe)
method_signatures.python: def check_safety(start: int, end: int, unsafe: list[list[int]]) -> str
method_signatures.cpp: std::string checkSafety(int start, int end, const std::vector<std::vector<int>>& unsafe)

input_format: Line 1: start end. Line 2: integer n. Next n lines: unsafe interval start end.
